helpDefinition.title: Project Documentation Help
helpDefinition.componentContainer:
Project Documentation Help
Overview
This plugin generates javadoc-like documentation for specified projects, including details about each procedure and its parameters.
Procedures The following procedures are available:
Generate Documentation - Generates project documentation
Generate Documentation
Description: Generates project documentation
Inputs:
Footer - Text to be displayed at the foot of each page. Defaults to simple copyright notice.
Header - Text to be displayed at the head of each page. Defaults to simple document description.
Project Description - Description displayed on projects summary page.
Project List - List of projects to document. Defaults to empty, which lists all projects.
Project Title - Title displayed on projects summary page.
Outputs: Documentation link on Job Details Page under 'Links' section
Affects: none
